website_summaries.verdict: A handheld design for more control.
pros: A modern and elegant design in a handheld cheese slicer
Totally adjustable for slices up to 1/4" thick
Made for everyday use to replace pre-sliced cheese, so it is durable and comfortable
Heavy duty roller makes it easy to use
The one-year warranty has you covered
cons: Some users note that they have to adjust the wires often as they can loosen with use

customer_reviews.title: It was doing a great job til it broke in half while cutting the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had your product for almost a year and was loving it. It was doing a great job til it broke in half while cutting the cheese no pun intended. I believe the item should still be under warranty can you please help. I have emailed the Parellas team directly and no reply it's been over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hdez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After four months of use, the finish has come off the roller and leaves a black residue on the cheese. The overall quality felt so good, initially, however it has not stood up very well. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: rdeed

customer_reviews.title: wire system is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The wire system for this is terrible. The overall quality of the handle is great, but there is no way to replace the wire when it breaks and it broke after a few uses. We now have this great handle, but it won't slice cheese. It was a very expensive 20 slices of cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Anacortes family

customer_reviews.title: Have some cheese
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been on me for some time to get him a proper cheese slicer as he likes to have sliced cheese on his omlettes. We love this cheese slicer the only draw back is the wire does not come fully attached so you have to figure out how to attach it but it wasn't to hard so I still give it 5 stars. Oh and we love that it's adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Mindy79

customer_reviews.title: Oxidizing roller
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue we have is that the roller is oxidizing after just a couple runs through the dishwasher. This leads us to believe that it is not stainless steel as we lead to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Dhop

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you like black stuff on your cheese
customer_reviews.text: This thing leaves black stuff all over the cheese. Why?? Why is that even possible and why is this getting so many good reviews?
customer_reviews.author: AsMeow

customer_reviews.title: The Best!.....but
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome cheese slicer. It's built like the proverbial "brick outhouse". It solid and will last forever BUT......The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because of the brass adjusting screws. The screws need to be larger than the frame and a diameter of 5/8" would be perfect! Right now you need a screwdriver to tighten the screws down and to be honest who keeps a flat head screwdriver in their kitchen drawer, and if you do who wants to break it out every time you want to change the thickness of the slice, which I do often. Please install larger adjusting screws and you would have the ULTIMATE cheese slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jo

customer_reviews.title: It's Adjustable and you don't need a took kit to make the adjustments you want.
customer_reviews.text: I like to slice up Mini Babybel cheese to put on crackers and eat them. The Mini Babybel cheese are about 1-3/4" round and about 5/8" thick after the wax preservative is removed. The diameter is fine but how to you slice the the thickness of the slices to have equal thickness of the slices. AH-HA! The Bellemain Adjustable Thickness Cheese Slicer to the rescue. It will also make your spam (you surely know what that is) just the right thickness for your sandwiches. Just make sure whatever you are slicing is soft or you will be using that spare Replacement Stainless Steel Cutting Wire that is included. Happy Slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Neil M. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not what it is cracked up to be...
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand how this item has received such good reviews. It is extremely difficult to slice cheese with it, or any or item. You have to use a ton of effort to get it to slice and it doesn't slice evenly across the surface. If your hands are wet at all, forget trying to slice anything as the handle is so short and it requires so much effort that your hand slides right off. I had so much hope for this due to other reviews but I've tried using it multiple times and even had other people try and use it and we all thought it was extremely difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: AMY PERRINGTON

customer_reviews.title: THERE IS EFFECTIVELY NO WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: While this item seems well made, the wire design is garbage. The wire breaks easily and replacements are NOT available. Further, the seller advertises a 1-YEAR WARRANTY, however, there is no information on the package or anywhere on the internet indicating how to contact the company to make a warranty claim. In other words, THERE IS NO WARRANTY! I would NOT buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: N. Ladrach

customer_reviews.title: it's nice to have this
customer_reviews.text: After having several cheaper slicers that didn't last long, it's nice to have this. It's larger, heavier and apparently built to last. I appreciate that it comes with an extra wire (now if I can just figure out how to keep track of the wire until I need it, and remember that it's there.) It works beautifully. Note that to adjust the thickness, you unscrew the two ends of the roller individually. This is less convenient than the one-screw mechanism on some other slicers.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Slices well through chedar
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, well built adjustable cheese slicer. I am having some problem making uniform slices, even though I have used this type of slicer for many, many years. I usually get old ones from second hand stores but thought I would get something new. The new slicer works well at actual slicing through the cheese, just hard to get a uniform slice the way it's made, even though I followed the directions. I use it to slice very large blocks of sharp cheddar. However, the slicer arrived in a plastic bag because it had fallen off the display card, AND the extra slicing wire was missing. Am a little unhappy about that, but I suppose that is Amazon's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Insert cheese joke here.
customer_reviews.text: It works well, it's adjustable, the stainless steel is easy to clean. The wire got a little loose after some weeks of use, but I tightened the screws and it's back to normal. I have a feeling I'll lose the spare wire before I'll ever need it, but it's giving me peace of mind for the time being. I gave it 4 stars because the handle is awkwardly short, but don't let the less than perfect score fool you, this is better than any plastic wire cheese slicer you'll find at your local grocer.
customer_reviews.author: B.Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Five Star cheese slicer!
customer_reviews.text: Buying cheese in a block and slicing it yourself is a money saver and your cheeses will stay fresh much longer. It is tricky though to get every slice uniform without a guide. Additionally, I like some cheeses thick and some very thin. So, when I found the Bellemain Adjustable Cheese slicer I was so happy! It's very easy to use and has enough weight to it to stand the test of time. I know I'm very happy with this purchase and will recommend this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a cheese slicer that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone thru 4 other Cheese slicers this year searching for one that is actually useful without worrying about when it will fail. I've been using this one daily for over 3 months. It has outlasted all the highest rated slicers I found this year, and still works better than most did the day I 1st tried them. If it breaks tomorrow I've already gotten my money's worth from it's performance to date, and I will instantly be ordering another and maybe some spares. I really hate it when the wire pops or comes loose on one of these. On one, the handle broke in two. Please keep these available.
customer_reviews.author: RetieO

customer_reviews.title: This a very sturdy, well made cheese cutter
customer_reviews.text: The description is accurate. This a very sturdy, well made cheese cutter. I had purchase an adjustable cheese cutter from the grocery store. My husband loves the idea of different thickness of cheese, but original grocery store cutter was very flimsy and the cutter was already becoming loose. When I saw your cutter on Amazon it sounded like a great purchase. It is very sturdy, nice weight to it, cuts well and comes with an extra cutter "wire". I like that the company is family owned. I would recommend you purchase; and I would purchase again. Great gift
customer_reviews.author: Karen C Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Slice your own cheese
customer_reviews.text: I was I. Desperate need for a cheese sliver. I can always depend on Amazon to have what I need - this type of an item isn’t always easy to find and it is usually very expensive - cuts through cheese like butter - I love cheese trays with peels iced cheese such an easy snack before guests eat their meal. This slicer slices through hard cheese as well as soft cheese. Slices can be thisck or thin. It saves you money - no need to purchase the sliced cheese. Just purchase a block and so the slicing yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Cupanne

customer_reviews.title: it is very important for us to have a good cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: Since my wife and I are very fond of cheese, it is very important for us to have a good cheese slicer. After looking around in so many stores, it was a relief to find this Bellemain Cheese Slicer. It is constructed very well and has an easily adjustable wire blade, something which a number of other cheese slicers surprisingly lack. The price was exceptionally reasonable. I would certainly recommend this fine tool.
customer_reviews.author: DR_CJK

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and well made!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are getting harder & harder to find. Searched several typical department stores. Most carried the throw away after a couple of uses types... (ie. The kind that the wire begins to rust or sag. Usually made of plastic) However, this cheese slicer looks to be worth the money. "WIDE" is the word of the day to describe my first impression. Equal to the size of sandwich bread! I like it. The wire is stainless steel and comes with 1 replacement wire. Clean-up says, "Wash by Hand"... But that's a small price to pay. Should last much longer than those cheap plastic types. Good purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Warner

customer_reviews.title: The best product I have purchased for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: If i could rate this above 5 stars I would. This is a heavy duty and very adjustable slicer. I had purchased similar slicer locally, one made one cut and broke, the second one made it for 3 slices and broke. This one appears to be one that will be in our drawer for years. It's nice to buy something at a fair price and it exceeds expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Checkers

customer_reviews.title: Works well ~ so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my previous cheese slicer that broke it's wire. My old one worked perfectly for several decades, and because these look so much alike, I thought I was buying the same brand and quality. When it arrived I realized that isn't the case. The old one was not only USA made, but is entirely stainless steel. It was obvious on arrival this one is not entirely stainless ~ only the handle is. Also, it is not USA made. So, I am hoping it will last like my old one, but since it came wiht a spare wire, my old one is also resurrected.
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: It's not as good as grandmas used to be
customer_reviews.text: I got a block of cheese so I bought this since I hate cutting them with a knife, it sticks to the side of the knife blade, we all know that game. This though with every cut when you get to the end of the cut it breaks the cheese and makes a mess. Not sure if it will do this with all cheeses or not, but it's livable just not like the one grandma had that worked fluidly. It's kind of a steel tank too. Don't want to drop this on your cheese dish or smash. It's ok I guess not super impressed with the end cut's though. Respond if you have a ssimilar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Call me KID

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a very durable product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it looked like a similar slicer I already have. Being able to adjust the slice size is nice, but more difficult than the old slicer. It's heavier than the old slicer also. I would say it would last longer, but I doubt the old one will break in my lifetime. I prefer the old one, but I've used it for 15 years. We'll see what I think of this one that many years from now. I have purchased the cheap plastic kind. Don't waste your money. This one is quality. Perhaps too good. I doubt I will be able to find the replacement wire when or if the the time comes. But it's nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: Have had many cheese slicers. Being Italian we use a LOT of cheese. This thing is amazing. Well built ( naturally,it is made in the USA) substantial heavy handle. The configuration of the cutting wire allows for a cut all the way to the bottom of what you are cutting thus no "tail end of the cheese left over. Once I used this cutter I dumped the other 5 cutters I had. I think this will last a long time. Cant tout this enough, great product.
customer_reviews.author: RJChip

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: We had an old cheese slicer that finally, after many years, "gave up the ghost". We ordered a replacement but had a bad experience with it. However, this new cheese slicer simply is the best ... better than our old cheese slicer and better than its first replacement. When you pick this slicer up, you'll notice that it is must from high quality metals. The cutting wire is sturdy, AND the sliced cheese thickness is adjustable. Frankly, I don't know what else I could ask for in a cheese slicer. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chuqeaux is an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than what I've mentioned it works well as it suppose to and seems to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give 5 stars to this product yet. I haven't had it long enough and I need to know if the wire will hold up for a long time. They give an extra wire (which is nice) but does that mean the wire has a tendency to break? The wire should be strong enough to hold up almost forever if you do not abuse the slicer. Other than what I've mentioned it works well as it suppose to and seems to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.D.

customer_reviews.title: This is the Hercules of handheld wire cheese slicers
customer_reviews.text: Seriously - it's beefy as hell. My wimpy kids need to use both hands when they're cutting cheese. Me, I can handle it easily with a finger or two. It cuts like crazy too... no cheese can stand up to this thing. The adjustment is pretty awesome too... you can make lopsided slices if you want. Me, I prefer precision cut uniform thickness cheese. This thing is so tough, I tried to cut a brick with it, and it really wanted to, but just couldn't. If you're in the market for a cheese slicer, get this mofo. It's legit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Knapek

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a couple of years ago and it worked great until we got a dishwasher. Less than two month later, the "chrome" plating on the roller came off and now it leaves black residue on the cheese. For the money they are charging, they could make the roller solid stainless steel or even plastic and it would be great. As it is, you are wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar slicer I'd had for years and really liked, although it wasn't adjustable as this one is. I had made the mistake of putting it through the dishwasher and the metal (whatever it was) was damaged and began leaving black smudges on my hands when used. I won't make that mistake with this wonderful new one. I really love the weight and sturdiness of this slicer, and especially love that I can set it for whatever thickness I desire. Great kitchen gadget from great little American manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn K

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like cutting the cheese and so does my wife. It is simply a joy to cut the cheese. I mean when using this cheese cutter of course. It is perhaps the best cheese cutter I have ever owned. Sturdy, heavy, metal, strong wire with replacement if needed, adjustable cutting thickness, all works as advertized. Also, the wire is offset so that you can cut right down to the cutting surface without needing to angle the cut near the end.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sprat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cheese slicer looks good, and feels heavy duty. Upon closer inspection, it's chrome plated pot metal, so I don't know if this is one of those deals that will last for decades, but at the price point, I think that's OK. I used it as soon as I got it on a large block of aged white cheddar, and it worked pretty well (be sure to wash it first as it has dirt on it from the manufacturing process). I did notice the packaging stated not to put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Cut the Cheese!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew I could get so excited about cutting the cheese?! We have tried a few different cheese slicers over the past few years. Either they tend to break, do wobbly thick horrible slices or just plain old make my husband cuss. This thing is so good! First of all, it is heavier than you'd think because it is well made and sturdy. The adjustable slice option is lovely and we have been very pleased. It is very consistent, cleans easily and it's thoughtful to have the replacement cutting wire included. All at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bethums

customer_reviews.title: Favorite style of cheese cutter for Velveeta - Grill Cheese
customer_reviews.text: It gets just the right size of sliced cheese for grilled cheese sandwiches, which were mainly childhood memories until Covid-19 made us cook more. Quick and easy sandwiches. I have chosen to hand clean immediately after finish using, towel dry and place on counter to dry the interior. The barrel on the one in childhood was solid so no liquid or debris got inside anything. Includes extra wire, which can be replaced. I have never had to replace one. The last one I had did not have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slices every time
customer_reviews.text: I love this adjustable cheese slicer. No more cut knuckles from grating cheese for sandwiches - I can cut nice thin slices with this. I may even try it with homemade pizza. It's very easy to adjust the wire to make your slices thicker or thinner. One quick twist of a screwdriver on each side loosens the wire, and you slide the screws up or down for adjustment. Then, tighten, and you're on your way. Cleanup is simple. I wash it by hand, making sure that the roller is clean all the way around, and let it air dry. I haven't had to change the wire yet, but I'm sure it will be just as easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Waters

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my reliable slicer snapped after decades of use. This one looked similar, and it comes with a spare cutting wire, the Achilles heel of the previous cutter. It's a lot larger, heavier and more cumbersome than that old reliable one though. I plan to keep it as a spare, but I'm getting the German Westmark cutter. That might be more like my old slicer. The spare wire's nice idea, but could I find it by the time the original one snaps?
customer_reviews.author: Woodley6

customer_reviews.title: It Slices Cheese
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this cheese slicer for a short time so I can’t vouch for how well it will last. However, it’s remarkably heavy. The weight suggests that it might last longer than more lightweight slicers. The handle certainly should never break and it comes with a spare wire, so I have high hopes. The heaviness makes it a bit challenging to use because the handle isn’t quite long enough to provide the leverage to take advantage of the weight - hence the 3 stars for the ease of use. All told, though, it’s a very nice slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Price

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well but has some issues.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, sturdy design. However the cutting wire has a tendency to loosen. This causes uneven slices as you use the slicer. It also brings into question the ultimate durability of the wire itself. Thickness adjustment tends to slip as well unless it is screwed down very tightly, which then makes it difficult to loosen for adjustment to a new thickness. Conceptually a good product with a nice design that is somewhat lacking in actual performance.
customer_reviews.author: Neumba

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice slicer, heavy duty, and with a pair of tension screws on it to tighten the cutting wire as it loosens, which is bound to happen especially during the first few uses. It is reassuring that it comes with a spare wire - and speaking of coming, it got here very fast. Love the way one can adjust the thickness of the slices quickly and easily with a thumb screw on either side. Sturdy, well made, and up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use slicer
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's been easy to use especially on mozzarella cheese and cheddar cheese. Cleaning is easy. I wash it by hand of course with a sponge and rinse it with water. I'm hoping this will last a long time and it does come with an extra Wirecutter. Oh you can you could flip it to either side pending on what thickness you would like but you could also adjust the the wire itself to for the thickness of the cheese you'd like or whatever you're slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Catlady71

customer_reviews.title: GREAT cheese slicer!! Adjustable widths!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 giant reels of cheese to slice and freeze. This slicer did the job wonderfully. I even got to set the slice width to thin like I wanted. Thank you for a fine American made product.
customer_reviews.author: SVC

customer_reviews.title: Not for hard cheese
customer_reviews.text: This slicer work fantastic for medium to soft cheese. Growing up eating Velveeta grilled cheese sandwiches I've been looking for this type in the local stores but none were this sturdy and as easy to hold. Cuts the perfect slice thickness for the perfect sandwiches because its adjustable. Good Buy
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fraisure

customer_reviews.title: Stout but badly engineered.
customer_reviews.text: Robustly made but not a very good design. The cutting wire is too thick, it drags through soft cheese and pulls off big chunks at the end of the slice. The wire is in a strange location with respect to the center of the roller making it very difficult to control the thickness of slices. I much prefer slicers with the cutting wire parallel to the center line of the roller and in line with the handle, much easier to use. I really don't care much for this...the $2 ones at Dollar General do a better job with less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Karl  Schneider

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This slicer is VERY sturdy, heavy, and tough. It even included a second cutting wire. The screws for adjusting the roller could be more user friendly. You need to use a flat tipped screwdriver to adjust each end and carefully sight in the setting to ensure the roller is even on both sides to the wire. Would have been nice to have a single adjusting screw like a wingnut that doesn't require a screw driver. Still well worth the $10 cost.
customer_reviews.author: BR549

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, bad execution.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to clean for me but I’m able to clean after soaking it in water. I liked the firmness of the handle but when cutting it seems like it gets flimsy and the adjusters starts to move.. I am reviewing because after a few months the wire finally broke! I didn’t know we got an extra, knowing my luck I probably threw it out. With that said I might buy one of those non adjustable cheese slicers but I wouldn’t recommend this product unless you can avoid the same problems I did..
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lion

customer_reviews.title: A good idea, but hard to use
customer_reviews.text: This is difficult to use- the advertisement makes it look easy. I like that it isn't sharp to hurt you, but if I'm honest about how well it cuts with a wire, it would be easier with a blade
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, this slicer is great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The wire is easily adjustable so you can decide on the thickness of your cheese slice. However, it is a little challenging to use with a baby loaf size cheddar cheese block. It works better to push the slicer down into the cheese versus pulling the slicer towards you. The biggest issue is that the wire does not stay tightened on one side, making the slice different thicknesses. I had to re-tighten the wire every few slices. I would buy this slicer again and I would recommend it, with the additional tidbit of making sure the wire is where you want it before you cut each cheese slice.
customer_reviews.author: Pond

customer_reviews.title: Didn't quite cut the cheese . . . so to speak.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a TANK! Honestly I've used construction hammers that are more easily handled. After struggling trying to get the cutting string to adjust to anything thinner than 1/4" I only managed to mangle a 2lb block into what looked more like shredded cheese than slices. Now I've gone back to a good old sharp knife and thinking of ways to repurpose this slicer . . . Perhaps a very compact boat anchor or a handheld soil compactor lol
customer_reviews.author: epinvt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product for slicing cheese! I love that you can adjust the thickness of the cheese to how you want. Works well, heavy duty and love that it comes with an extra wire slicer to replace the present one that's already loaded into the slicer itself! I think it's still too early to see how well it holds up in time but will do an update after several months of use!
customer_reviews.author: ThisGirlWritesStuff

customer_reviews.title: Really Poor Quality Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I used this cheese slicer 1 time to cut some cheddar cheese and the wire got so loose it could only cut a jagged piece. As you can see in the pictures I posted the cutting wire is bowed to the point that you can forget about getting a clean cut. In another picture you can see the barrel turned black after one time through the dishwasher showing what poor quality this cheese sliver is.
customer_reviews.author: wodon43

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a large roller compared to other slicers, that makes the slicing easier. Very easy to change the slice thickness and it actually stays where you set it. The cutting wire is of a little bit larger diameter than most others, makes it a little bit harder to pull through a block of cheese, but that beats wires that wear out or stretch because they are not as strong. Overall a very good slicer, wish I had found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Marine, Retired

customer_reviews.title: Fair enough.
customer_reviews.text: Hear me out. It was awesome the first 3 weeks ( we are big cheese eater here ). after that, the metal string was already starting to get more and more loose and makes it very hard to cut the cheese all the way through. I would’ve expect it to last longer. They give you a replacement string but still ...! And where the string is attached, its hard to clean that out. Cheese get stuck in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Joanny Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The way this is made, to be able to adjust the thickness of the slices, makes it a little more difficult to use. I also find that the part that is supposed to roll across the cheese to make for a smoother cut, doesn't actually roll. One positive note is that it does come with an extra wire for when the other one breaks....
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the quality at this price
customer_reviews.text: When I lifted the slicer out of the box I was very surprised at the size and weight. A very professional well made cheese slicer. I love how easy it is to adjust the width of the slice and lock it in with the brass nuts on each side. I have never owned a cheese slicer of this quality. I use it every day because we love cheese and I believe I will use this for many years .
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had a slicer years ago that was adjustable but it on had 1 screw to tighten and it would loosen up a lot. I thought I would try this with the 2 screw to tighten. It's awesome, the slicer never came out of adjustment and I cut 6 lbs of cheese for a party this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I grew up using this style of cheese slicer and finally had to replace mine because it rusted out. This got such great reviews yet no one mentioned how HEAVY it is! At first I thought the weight would help cut through cheeses but, no. Plus, the handle is too short and I'm a woman with small hands. Then, when you finally manage cut force your way through (I tried cheddar and Monterey jack) the end prevents it from cutting the last 1/4 inch so, you still need a knife to finish it off.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ware

customer_reviews.title: Unusable!
customer_reviews.text: We like the appearance and apparent sturdiness of the product. However, we are in our 80's and the strength necessary to use the product prohibits us from using it. Frankly, it is too big. We are not returning it at this time as we intend to give it to our son and his wife who maybe able to use it. I have had to order another brand cheese slicer. We are very disappointed as outwardly we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Very robust/sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this cheese slicer almost every morning on my Norwegian Brown Cheese (Brunost/Gjetost) which is a fairly sticky and tough cheese to cut. Using other style cheese slicers was difficult, but this one cuts though it with no problems. I also like on difficult to cut cheeses that the wire works well, but is not actually sharp to the touch if you have to really pull it hard through the cheese. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DaryL K. Boe

customer_reviews.title: Cuts the cheese
customer_reviews.text: This is one heck of a cheese slicer! My husband jokes about my industrial size cheese slicer because it is HUGE and very heavy. We have only had it maybe a week or so but it seems like a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Norris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable
customer_reviews.text: This product is made of sturdy metal and so far the wire is working well , even when slicing hard cheese. The slices are not superthin but they're not overly thick either . I think you can adjust it a little but I haven't needed to yet. I like the fact that it comes with a replacement wire, and the price makes this a really good value . I would recommend this product and the seller - thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best wire4 cheese slicer I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This cheese slicer is make from heavy stainless steel with an easily adjustable roller to set your cheese thickness from paper thin to a good thick slice of cheddar. The cutting wire is secured by two screws so it stays taut and comes with a spare but I haven't needed it. It's 4 inches wide and has all smooth edges so it's a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot do thin slices at all, locking bolts are bronze plated but will start to rust.
customer_reviews.text: In the advertisement, it says "Adjust the slicer to give you wafer thin slices or...". This is completely untrue. It can't do thin slices at all, and I've tried every possible configuration to hold it down and move upwards, backwards, forwards, downwards to see if it could slice a thin 'wafer' slice. I like thinly sliced cheese, as much as I like thinly sliced luncheon meat. Of course, I stack a pile on. Maybe its the extra air inbetween that makes it enjoyable. Anyhoo, this slicer doesn't cut it. Also, don't try to cut cheese that has been in the fridge or it'll warp your wire, it can only handle room temp cheese with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-constructed metal cheese slicer with an extra wire included. Heavy duty construction. Comes with one wire already installed and it is very simple to adjust the desired thickness of the cheese slice you prefer by simply adjusting a small knob on either side of the slicer which allows you to move the wire to increase or decrease the thickness of the desired slice. Glad we found this slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cheese cutter after looking at the reviews. After using it just a few times cutting wire became floppy, so I tightened the wire with the screw. Just sitting in the drawer the wire became floppy again, so I tightened it a The next time I stared using it the the wire broke. The cutter was made to pull not to push. Will buy some other cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome construction
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and the overall size feels good as well. It does the intended job for sure. Easy to clean as well. I like how they included an extra wire in case of breakage. I do wish they would of included a simple jig to make it easier to adjust the height of the slices and maintain equal depth across the complete cutting area. Without that it is a bit difficult to adjust since both sides are free floating with a lock down screw. Other than that issue, I am extremely happy with the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple of times, but I love it. We go though a lot of cheese. I buy cheese by the block and cut it myself. I don’t like presliced cheese. So far this is the perfect cheese slicer. It is sturdy. I have gone through a lot of the cheap cheese slicers that I got at the grocery store. They always broke after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many cheese slicers over the years. The common flaw with them was the slicer wire would become loose and sag. The Bellemain slicer's wire stays taut and cheese slicing is consistent and a breeze. Its a snap to adjust the thickness. It comes with an extra replacement wire. The price is phenomenal. Very reasonable for the quality of the slicer. Thank you Bellemain.
customer_reviews.author: IE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slicer of cheese
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. My adjustment has nuts that connect to wire in the middle. Have run through dishwasher and it worked out fine. It's good to keep wet while using so cheese doesn't dry on wire and mess up your cutting. There is something that sliced cheese tastes better, especially if uniformly sliced.
customer_reviews.author: KcKerry

customer_reviews.title: Needs locking slots
customer_reviews.text: I'll go over my only negative that keeps me from giving it 5 stars. There is no way to lock the cutter cord on either size to ensure the wire is straight. There should be little grooves or something to ensure it is even on each size. Other than that it is very solid and cuts great. Also included a spare wire.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans easily, looks good after several hand washes. Have to have soft cheese to have it at thinest setting,but I got it thin you just have to play with the setting. I got it thinner then store bought slices. The harder the cheese the bigger the slices. If you don't adjust it, it may get harder to push, and if you push to hard the wire may break.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bellemain Adjustable Thickness Cheese Slice
customer_reviews.text: I have started buying cheese in blocks to save money. Realizing it was hard cutting slices so decided to purchase the Bellemain Adjustable Thickness Cheese Slicer. Very easy to use, followed very simple directions. It was a good purchase, very functional, very sturdy and will pay for itself after several purchases of block cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Darcy

customer_reviews.title: A very dependable cutter
customer_reviews.text: This is an exact replacement for a cutter I had for 20 years, but lost in a move. If you don't try to speed slice, or pull holding onto the stem only, this should last another 20 years. Pulling holding onto both the stem and the bracket will spread the strain across the whole wire, and not break the stem or wire.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a joy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I think this cheese slicer is great! It is very sturdy and easy to adjust the thickness of the cheese slices as well as the tightness of the wire. The ONLY thing that I think that would make this slicer better is if there were measurement markers on the sides to ensure that when you adjust the roller for thickness, that the roller would be perfectly even on both sides to ensure even cheese slices. This is a VERY MINOR issue for me and it should not deter you from buying this. I am still very pleased with it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Slicer
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cheese slicer for an apartment kitchen for guests to use. We didn't want to spend a lot of money, but wanted a decent quality. We purchased this product because it received good reviews, which isn't often reflective of the product but for the price we decided to give it a try. We were very surprised at the sturdiness and quality of this cheese slicer. It is heavy and a high quality product. It comes with an extra wire and instructions for replacing it. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carll

customer_reviews.title: A cheese slicer like grandma used to have
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, adjustable cheese slicer does a great job with velveeta. We also use it for some of our harder block cheese, but that can really stress the wire. Overall, we're very happy with the quality of the slicer, but the screws that adjust the roller for slice thickness have loosened while cutting slices. We do just tighten them back up with no problem, but they don't seem to want to hold super tight. Still love the quality for the price and the extra wire that came in the package.
customer_reviews.author: K Griffee

customer_reviews.title: Bellemain Adjustable Thickness Cheese Slicer.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a cheaper model cheese slicer and the handle broke the second time we used it. I searched Amazon to find the best one and found the Bellemain Adjustable Thickness Cheese Slicer and so glad I did. This one is the best and it is strong and does a great job. I love that it is adjustable also. One of the best choices I have ever made. I am so happy with it and I know you will be too.. Thank you Bellemain for your quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Camelot 40

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Unfortunately the wire broke after just a couple of uses. I contacted seller the first time it broke and was sent a replacement, which you guessed it broke after just a couple of uses. While I appreciate the heavy duty feel of this slicer I guess the price is reflective of the life of the product. Too bad. I really wanted to enjoy the use of this product for more that a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: angela f.

customer_reviews.title: Pass The Cheese Please
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? I’ve read some of the negative reviews, but I just don’t see it. Maybe there’s an older model or something and they’ve since made improvements, I don’t know. All I can say is the cheese slicer I received does a bang up job at what it was designed to do, slice cheese to the desired thickness. The product is sturdy and has the feel and weight of a durable product. Plus, it comes with a replacement wire. I’m just cheesy pleasy about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is the best cheese slicer (hand held) for the money. The first one I owned, I had for about 2 or 3 years. I lost the replacement line and had to order another one. As long as they keep making this one, I will keep buying them when my current decides to move on to the big cheese slicer in the sky.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese cutter.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cheese slicer/cutter in February so I've had time to use it and to see how it was going to hold up. Almost six months later I'm completely pleased with this product. You can easily adjust the thickness of the slice by changing the angle. So far no broken wire or any problem. It might be a good idea to let hard cheeses soften a bit and to rock the wire back and forth while you're cutting. The weight is good and it feels sturdy and solid in my hand. Chrome like finish cleans up very easily, cheese doesn't stick. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Know what your buying...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times now and is exactly what I wanted, even bigger than I thought... Second review, after three washing it a few times the roller has turned color and now when you use it it will leave streeks of Gray on cheese...is aluminium breaking down. Also the wire is getting looser only after four uses...
customer_reviews.author: Keven

customer_reviews.title: It's well built and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cheese slicer. It is the best one I have ever owned. It is adjustable. It comes with extra slicey thingies. It's handle is sturdy, has some weight to it....kinda like me...hahahaha! Seriously though...I couldn't be happier. I bought it because of the price, but it's not an El Cheapo. Oh, and it even slices Spam!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbalicious

customer_reviews.title: This not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The wire cutter stretches if used on hard cheese and then breaks. The cutter comes with a replacement wire that also stretches and breaks. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Covey

customer_reviews.title: Functional cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: The cheese slicer does a very good job of slicing through all the soft and semi-hard cheeses that I like. Adjusts easily. I used to have a cheese slicer that I tried to replace. However, it is no longer in production. The only thing that prevented me from giving a 5 star review is that I couldn't adjust it to get a slice of cheese quite as thin as that which I used to get from my old slicer. Product is still a good one and the thinness of the slice is the only thing that I have to complain about. Maybe, I'm just imagining that I used to get a thinner slice?
customer_reviews.author: mcbrite81

customer_reviews.title: Good cheese cutter
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great slicer. It’s pretty robust feeling. Easy to use, although I tend not to changed the cutting depth. I’m happy it came with an extra cutting wire too. No idea about longevity yet. This replaced a 30+ year old wire slicer whose wire finally broke. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: May have expected too much
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a large block of aged cheddar and the wire stretched on the first use. It was a 3.5" cut on firm cheddar, so I may have expected too much. It is a little difficult to get a good grip because of the size and finish of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Quality, adjustable cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my daughter eats cheese like crazy. This is soooo much faster and easier than cutting a block up with a knife. I love that it is adjustable, so you can customize how thin/thick you want your cheese. I was surprised at how heavy it is for a little thing. It is quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Cheese Slicer
customer_reviews.text: So when I bought this, I bought this keeping an open mind that these may more likely not work than work and am surprised that this works but does require effort especially for hard cheese lie Swiss an cheddars. You line up the sting according to the size cut that you would like and begin shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Ed

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly accurate and smooth cutter
customer_reviews.text: While initially thinking this cheese cutter was too heavy, once I put it into use its weight actually seemed to assist in cutting the brick of cheese smoothly. The stainless steel wire is perfectly taught. Going through the hardest of my cheeses with ease. One thing I would appreciate would be a broader surface for my thumb while holding the cutter. The wire is offset to the down facing side of the cutter. Initially I didn't notice but was extremely grateful for this attention to detail. When cutting cheese the wire goes to the cutting board leaving you with a completely perfect slice of cheese top to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - Thicker Wire
customer_reviews.text: This cheese cutter is the best I have every used! I have had it for just over a month and use it regularly. The slice size is adjustable, which I love because I like my slices just the right size. It is well made with thicker metal than those cheap flimsy ones. Even the wire is a little thicker and stronger. It feels like a quality product that won't have you trying to fix a broken or disconnected wire every time you try slicing a hard cheese and if it should happen to break, which I doubt, it comes with an additional replacement wire. I would definitely recommend this "Bellemain Adjustable Thickness Cheese Slicer"!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: adjusts easily, but not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I like that the thickness is adjustable. I just wish it were dishwasher safe. I did run it through the dishwasher a few times, and it didn't pit, but the finish started to come off the roller. Other reviewers said the darkened roller leaves smudges on the cheese, so I wash mine by hand now. Not a big deal, but I do wish the roller were also stainless steel. Another tip: Kerrygold Dublin cheese is too hard.
customer_reviews.author: CDville

customer_reviews.title: It's a good cheese slicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cheese slicer and gave it to my mom, she has arthritis in her hands and has a hard time slicing cheeses with a regular knife. She was so happy when I gave it to her, so far she really likes it, it makes things a little easier when she's in the kitchen. ~Robert's Wife~
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Wolfington

customer_reviews.title: Slicing cheese from the block?.....
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a durable metal cheese slicer. I have gone through two already. I decided it was time to pay a little more and get one that lasts. I have only had this cheese slicer for a few weeks, but is already better than the last ones I had. It slices more even slicing and just feels better in the hand. No slipping. So far, so good. I hope it lasts longer than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a terrible company
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased my second of these within a year. Why? Because the first one broke. I reported it to the company complete with proof of purchase date and pictures of the problem and then......crickets. This IS a great cheese slicer. Unfortunately the one year warranty is total BS. If you choose to buy this, do so knowing that the warranty is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: donebylee

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but not too well on semi-soft cheese block
customer_reviews.text: I get block medium cheddar cheese in kinda large 4"x4"x12" blocks... it doesn't work well on that, because the span of the wire is barely the size of the cheese block, and the roller seems to either roll up the cheese, or not roll smoothly over it. Whether user error, or the device... it doesn't work for me.

customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Great slicer
customer_reviews.text: I had a slicer like this for many years, once it finally broke there didn't seem to be another around, I looked everywhere, this stainless steel, very sturdy slicer is exactly what i wanted, cleans super easy, easy to handle, makes perfect slices, and even came with a spare wire, hopefully this one will last as long as muy last one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: I love smoked Gouda cheese.
customer_reviews.text: The only place I can find Gouda cheese reasonably priced is Sam's, but its in a chunk now. This is my first time using a cheese slicer. It works well, adjust to thickness and makes nice even slices. Great price . It gets the job done better than a knife and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: TLMKC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this didn't line up to the 4.5 start review average. It's super flimsy and difficult to adjust. It does, however, adjust to create nice thin slices, which is why I've decided to just keep it. If you want something nicer, you'll have to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Slice safely
customer_reviews.text: I was certainly impressed when I pulled this out of the packaged. It is well made and heavier than the ones I have had in the past. I paid much more for one from a catalog. My daughter was cutting her fingers trying to cut large blocks of cheese, so she is slicing away like a pro after one use. I am so thankful for the extra wire, sometimes, after a few years, those do give way. So having a replacement is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: bg1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cutter
customer_reviews.text: The handle seems very sturdy. The wire...well, it's a wire. It seems as sturdy as it can be considering what it is. Bonus points for providing an extra wire in the packaging, so even if it breaks there is still a backup! The ease of cutting is slightly awkward. There is a definite "right side up," but once we got used to that there was no issue. As far as cleaning, I just wipe it down immediately after using it so the cheese emnants don't have a chance to get hard and crusty. Overall, this cutter seems to be of good quality. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
